channel.title: 508 barrows help
channel.description:
hi im using a davidscape source;) i was wondering if any of you guys know how to make the guthan's and dharok's and verac's effect work ?? ;) remember 508 davidscape
thanks to you guys if you can help me ;)

item.title: 508 barrows help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

In PlayerCombat.java, look for:

[code=java]
public int maxMeleeHit(Player p) {

	int a = p.getSkills().getLevel(2);
	int b = p.equipmentBonus[10];
	double c = (double) a;
	double d = (double) b;
	double f = 0;
	double h = 0;
	f = (d * 0.00175) + 0.1;
	h = Math.floor(c * f + 2.05);
	return (int) h; 
}[/code]

Change it to this:

[code=java] public int maxMeleeHit(Player p) {

	int a = p.getSkills().getLevel(2);
	int b = p.equipmentBonus[10];
	double c = (double) a;
	double d = (double) b;
	double f = 0;
	double h = 0;
	f = (d * 0.00175) + 0.1;
	h = Math.floor(c * f + 2.05);
	if(p.equipment[0] == DHAROKSHELM && p.equipment[0] = DHAROKSAX && p.equipment[4] == DHAROKSBODY && p.equipment[7] == DHAROKSLEGS) {
			h *= 1 + ((p.getLevelForXP(3) - p.skillLvl[3]) / 100)  

	}
	return (int) h; 
}[/code]

I’ve never tried this code before and I just wrote it off the top of my head, but if you replace the names with the correct ints, it should work. It would give the same max hits as RS, which is double damage if you’re almost dead.

Read full topic

Start with a 317, they are generally more simple, and there is a lot more information out there about the #317 protocol than any other revision.

item.title: 508 barrows help
item.dc:creator: @codan_santa codan santa
item.description:
@codan_santa wrote:

[quote=“The Outsider, post:2, topic:421020”]Short but sweet: First declare when they are equipping full Dharoks/Veracs… and then your max hit formula should increase the lower the players HP is/if player has full Verac equipped the protect prayer effect = false.

Now go put that into code terms.[/quote]

hmm can you please spoon feed me because im bad at coding atm :S XD
